pull_requests.title: BIP-3: update dead link in `bip-0003.md`
pull_requests.body: Hi! I fixed broken links in `bip-0003.md`. The issue was caused by incorrect letter casing in file references (`BIP-0002.mediawiki` → `bip-0002.mediawiki` and `BIP-0123.mediawiki` → `bip-0123.mediawiki`). The links have been updated to match the correct filenames, ensuring proper navigation.

comment_list.body: Great! Thanks for catching that. I added a commit to fix the link to BIP 123 above as well.

> I added a commit to fix the link to BIP 123 above as well.

Great! I don't see it, though. Edit: never mind, I do see it now.
